text: CSAS may refer to: * Canadian Special Air Service Company, an elite post-war parachute unit. * Center for the Study of the American South * Central Sleep Apnea Syndrome * Combined Statistical Area, a statistical unit used by the United States Census and other offices. * Coal Smoke Abatement Society, a predecessor to Environmental Protection UK. * Community Safety Accreditation Scheme * Chattanooga School for the Arts & Sciences * Czechoslovak Academy of Sciences * Command Stability Augmentation System, a fly-by-wire feature of the Panavia Tornado.
title: CSAS
